read_projections(projection_file=None, **kwargs)[source]

Reads and stores projections for given arguments

Arguments: time_start = start of time steps, time_end = end of time steps

number_of_proj_(un/)occupied = number of un/occupied states to project, axis = polarization vector for TD simulation as list
